content: This book is a reference book of the Java language and its related technologies. Its goal is to give a complete picture of Java and its technologies.  While the book can be read from the beginning to end, it is also designed to have individual sections that can be read independently.  To help find information quickly, navigation boxes are given in the online version for access to individual topics.
